forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun shines brightly, yet cool breezes sweep through the streets, dancing through the canyons of buildings with a freshness that invites exploration. The high, flirting with 66 degrees, is tempered by a west wind at 21 mph, presenting a delightful mixture of warmth and briskness that layers the air with a hint of exhilaration. As the temperatures ease into the mid-60s later on, the day’s clarity should remain steadfast—perfect for taking in the stunning views the city offers.

Come nightfall, the skyline will give way to a blanket of clouds, and a whisper of moisture may brush the city after 11 pm, with a subtle chance of drizzle. As you prepare to venture out, dressing in layers will be wise; a light jacket will harmonize with the evening's coolness, while a scarf may provide extra comfort against the gentle west-southwest winds. Given the current conditions and the time of day, an evening stroll along the waterfront could be splendid, perhaps culminating in a cozy café visit to savor a warm drink as the clouds gather softly above. The scene is set for an evening that beckons a blend of tranquility and gentle excitement as the city slowly shifts into night.
